spec_data.Name: perl-Carp-Always
spec_data.Description:
This module is meant as a debugging aid. It can be used to make a script
complain loudly with stack backtraces when warn()ing or die()ing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:27:10 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Warn and die in Perl noisily with stack backtraces
